name: Picky Packers
description:
How to play:

Controls: Z, X, A, D, or right click to rotate
Click and drag pieces to move them

Your goal is to place all the boxes in the container and completely fill it.
Some box colours are not allowed to touch. On the left side of the screen is a guide. If two colours which are adjacent in the guide, they may not be adjacent in the container.
If this rule is broken, the guide will highlight the two colours which shouldn't be adjacent. The package will not be shipped until you find another way to arrange the pieces.

The game ends when the timer on the right runs out.

Made by:
Thomas Horne
Carissa Kwok
Ehan Hassan
